text: first we've had some breaking news from
the US Supreme Court which has said that
same-sex couples have a constitutional
right to marry it was a 5-4 ruling and
the court said marriage is a fundamental
right and same-sex couples could not be
deprived of it
well the maxing the description has been
scenes of jubilation outside of the US
Supreme Court when crowds heard this
judgment it is being seen as a landmark
moment in American social history
yeah and just one further point the
judges are now considering also whether
same-sex marriage is conducted in one
state should be recognized in states
that prohibit such unions so there's
still a little bit more to come out of
this but at the moment the Supreme Court
has ruled that same-sex couples have a
constitutional right to marry
